entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generator types are sometimes being loaded twice #63189
  • Change signature should suggest importing namespace for a type that's not recognized #63187
  • Compiler lacks ways to get to the build-in operator methods it synthesizes from teh semantic mode. #63186
  • Implement LSP 'todo list'. #63182
    17.4
  • Visual Studio 2022's new rename box leads into forgetting "Rename symbol's file"-option after renaming non-symbol like variable, namespace and other #63181
    17.4
  • Possibly infinite loop in DecompilationMetadataAsSourceFileProvider.GetGeneratedFileAsync #63178
  • CSharpArgumentProvider tests are flakey. #63174
  • Consider some mechanism to get limited-access to syntax tree green-nodes. #63172
  • GTD fails to navigate to System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335 types #63166
  • `CS0169` is reported only on build #63164
  • `IDE0240` codefix leaves redundunt blank line #63163
  • IDE0053 (Use expression body for lambda expressions) is being reported as a warning by default in latest 17.4 dogfooding builds #63160
    17.4 P1

Closed

  • NumericIntPtr tests fail in certain partitioning schemes #63152
    17.4
  • Func<T1?,T2?> should not warn when assigned Func<int, string> #63176
  • Rename `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` to `ScopedRefAttribute` and remove unnecessary members #62838
    17.4
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute to allow marking implicitly `scoped ref` parameters as unscoped #62780
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32802.320 #63156

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: not for review. #63190
    Area-IDE
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Revert "Rename `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` to `ScopedRefAttribute` and simplify (#63009)" #63185
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove one of our out of proc analyzers. #63183
    Area-IDE
  • Remove one of our out of proc analyzers #63180
    Area-IDE
  • Skip rethrow #63179
    Area-IDE
  • Disable flakey tests #63175
    Area-IDE
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #63169
    Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • Use syntaxkinds pattern in more places #63168
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - add filter text #63167
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved" #63161
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.4 P1
  • Fetch the recoverable tree length option more lazily #63155
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Select SuggestionItem if there's no match in the list #63123
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix usage of unshared mscorlib ref in numeric IntPtr tests #63173
    Area-Compilers, Test, Flaky, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63184
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - Add logging #63165
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63170
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Avoid cases in OOP of accessing .Solution.Workspace #63118
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Put correct function call for Return Attributes #63084
    Area-IDE, Next
  • ci build cleanup #62845
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • [dev17.4-vs-deps port of #63161] Revert "When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved" #63162
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63159
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63158
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63157
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove solution crawler pre-indexing of documents #63153
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63154
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not count a cached solution as causing us to think it is sitll alive on teh host side #63141
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63125
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Avoid resolving parameter.Type in ReportParameterErrors() #63142
    Area-Compilers
  • Disallow access of .Solution.Workspace in remote scenarios. #63116
    Area-IDE
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Handle scenario where initial completion list contains only a single non-roslyn item #63083
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE
  • Move "generic attributes" feature into C# 11 #62952
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove bogus assert around C# import scopes. #63146
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable source build for ASP.NET external access project #62956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Avoid having to take locks repeatedly when cleaning out workspace #62986
    Area-IDE
  • Explore use of compression in sqlite #63111
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Partition integration tests #63067
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Test PDB checksums emitted for source generated files #63038
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
